author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-265: Auto-save of hierarchical file-based configurations is now also triggered by changes at a SubnodeConfiguration. A new event type EVENT_SUBNODE_CHANGED was introduced to report such changes to registered event listeners. Improvements of JavaDoc for HierarchicalConfiguration.

author: wsmoak
msg: Update Assembly plugin version number to 2.2-beta-1 to match published docs.

author: wsmoak
msg: Configure the site plugin to stage plugin sites under /plugins/${artifactId}-${version}.
Use 'mvn site:stage-deploy' to publish docs for snapshots or to stage docs for a release.
